page.title: 18A DAY IN LORRAINE'S LIFE
page.content: {A normal Sunday}for me isn't just staying at home with nothing to do.This is how I usually spend my Sundays:I get up at 8.30am,wash and {get my jodhpurs on,}I have a yoghurt and a glass of orange for breakfast. Then I put on my boots and coat pick up my lunch box and get in the car. After twenty minutes driving we reach {South Cerney Riding School.}I get a broom and a pitchfork from the feedroom,go into the yard and get a wheelbarrow and start mucking out.At 12.30pm we have lunch.Afterwards{I get {my pony ILISHE}from her field.I bring her back,groom her,ride her in the paddock then return her to the field. at 4.00pm mum comes to take me home.
